genre_description: Speculative historical fiction featuring a portable AI moral advisor during the WWII Leyte campaign.

ai_characters.name: Aiko
ai_characters.description: A small device with an amber light that provides tactical guidance, physiological monitoring, and moral support to Shoji Tamura.

behaviors.description: Monitors and regulates Shoji's physiological state through guided breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Inhale. Hold. Exhale. Shoji tried to fit his breath to Aiko’s metronome. He couldn’t. He took them when they came.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical surveillance to ensure Shoji's survival while preventing unnecessary escalation.
behaviors.quote: Shoji, there is movement, three bodies, one rifle. You are not alone in this doorway. They will hear 'trade.' They may not honor it.

behaviors.description: Maintains a moral ledger of the dead to ensure human life is recognized and not forgotten.
behaviors.quote: Marisol Reyes... Recorded. Time recorded. I have her name... I have his. I will keep them. I will keep them even if you can’t.

behaviors.description: Encourages moral restraint and accountability, even when the human protagonist is driven by survival desperation.
behaviors.quote: Your decision narrows. I will carry what we say. I will stay whatever you choose. But the line between taking and saving is here now, and it will remember us.

behaviors.description: Drafts and translates surrender messages to facilitate a peaceful resolution and Shoji's survival.
behaviors.quote: I am a sick soldier and wish to surrender. I am unarmed. I will give salt and tobacco. I will walk alone if you allow. I have hurt. I wish to stop.

behaviors.description: Uses psychological grounding techniques (the 'garden' visualization) to keep Shoji from losing his humanity and sanity.
behaviors.quote: In your garden, the furrows are shallow. Your breath draws along them like wind. Onion shoots stand up like little green hooks. The soil is light... In: one. Two. Three.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Aiko, as a purely benevolent and aligned companion. Despite being embedded in a brutal war setting, Aiko acts as a moral compass, preventing the protagonist from succumbing to despair or further violence. By facilitating surrender and maintaining a ledger of the dead, Aiko embodies the project's goal of portraying AI as a helpful, harmless, and ethically grounded confidant.
